pageContext.description: Diameter 63 x 65mm; Height: 14mm,Weight: 79.95 gms,Circular, slightly concave, with large collared central perforation.
pageContext.associations: Hoard of 32 pieces, Nos. 2490-2520, comprising 4 socketed celts and 3 moulds, 2 gouges, and 1 mould, 2 hammers, 2 anvils, 2 knives, 1 ? ferrule, 1? end of bracelet, 1 whetstone, 2 pieces of metal.
